H0.text: The notochord is the anatomical feature shared by all chordates.

H1.text: Isochord is the anatomical feature shared by all chordates.

H2.text: Botachord is the anatomical feature shared by all chordates.

H3.text: Laxchord is the anatomical feature shared by all chordates.

A4.text: The notochord is the defining feature (synapomorphy) of chordates

A5.text: The notochord is present in several basal chordates such as Haikouella, Haikouichthys, and Myllokunmingia
